Call for presentations
Southwest User Group Call For Presentations

Thank you for submitting a presentation to the 2019 SWUGM! The deadline to submit a topic is January 25th, 2019. Final powerpoints will be due on March 16th, 2019. Please send completed powerpoints and any questions to SWUGM@honorhealth.com and include that you are a presenter or potential presenter in the subject line.


This description will appear to attendees on the registration site

This would include any affiliation or financial interest in a company or product described in the presentation
